# iV

A system for making **synchronous, hackable, interactive narrative games**.

### Authors and Contributors
Currently in development by @jennie, @cecilycarver and @dann for Dames Making Games.

Built with Daimio: https://github.com/dxnn/daimio

Original concept and development by Alex Leitch for Hannah Epstein's synchronous multi-screen/device installation game PsXXYborg. 

### Support or Contact
Need help? Tweet at [@jennie](http://twitter.com/jennie)


## Installation

1. Install [Node.js](http://nodejs.org)
2. `$ git clone git@github.com:bentobx/iV.git`
2. `$ npm install mongodb`
3. `$ node daimio_sp_app.js`
4. go to server.foo:8888

Need help? Tweet at [@jennie](http://twitter.com/jennie)

## History

Concept and development by Alex Leitch for Hannah Epstein's synchronous multi-screen/device installation game PsXXYborg. Additional development support by Dann Toliver (@dxnn). Interfaces and additional support by Jennie Faber (@jennie). [ScreenPerfect](https://github.com/pretentiousgit/screenperfect-dev) is built with Daimio: https://github.com/dxnn/daimio
